name: BallSwarm
description:
"Experiment N°9-81, the balls will start at the city and live a time travel to the dinosaurs era for end up in holes"

Multiplicate Yourself in order to destroy the obstacles across your way.

Be prepared to be addicted at this new game with a unique DA

BallSwarm is a third-person course game where you control a ball that aims to multiply. You will then control a swarm of balls. You can then destroy more and more objects to get more and more balls but pay attention to other obstacles that can make you lose balls. All you have to do is arrive at the finish line with your army of balls to establish your best score. 

Ballemian Rollsody is a team composed of 7 second year students from E-Artsup who realized BallSwarm  in 10 weeks
